name: Puppy Match
description:
Puppy Match is a magic match 3 puzzle game with very cute puppies over 1000 levels. Swap diverse cute puppies to clear your way and dig into your own puppy adventures.

Puppy Match MAIN FEATURES:

●Create Crazy BOMBS by matching four or more cute puppies!
●Beautiful and Brilliant Graphics!
●Unwrap delicious environments and meet the refreshing backgrounds!
●Match Puppy and collect all kinds of objects, not only Puppies to win the level before you run out of moves!
●Daily events! Collect daily free coins of rewards.
●Fun and easy to play, but Challenging to fully master. Can you score 3 stars on every level?

Download the Puppy Match now and enjoy your lovely and amazing Puppy Match adventure!
developers: Yummy Nature - Casual Game of Star Crush
